body_html: You can find more info about NCCL here https://developer.nvidia.com/nccl . Having NCCL will provide some optimized implementations of certain operations for free, and provide additional implementations of other operations. It is optional though, and if you don't know that you need it then you probably don't need it.

It is optional though, and if you don't know that you need it then you probably don't need it.
